name: modular-people-portal
description: A React TypeScript microfrontend application implementing a modular people portal

scripts.install:all: npm run install:shell && npm run install:auth && npm run install:directory && npm run install:game
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:directory" "npm run start:game" "npm run start:shell"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:auth && npm run build:directory && npm run build:game && npm run build:shell
scripts.test:all: npm run test:shell && npm run test:auth && npm run test:directory && npm run test:game
scripts.clean: npm run clean:shell && npm run clean:auth && npm run clean:directory && npm run clean:game
